hero.subtitle: Create, customize, and deploy intelligent assistants without code. Design flows, connect data, and ship in minutes—not weeks.

features.title: Everything you need to build with confidence
features.subtitle: Beautiful by default, customizable by design, and engineered for performance.

fast.title: Blazing Fast
fast.desc: Optimized rendering and caching deliver instant feedback from first paint to heavy workloads.

powerful.title: Powerful
powerful.desc: Type‑safe APIs, streaming, and edge‑ready architecture so you can scale without rewrites.

security.title: Security
security.desc: Least‑privilege defaults, secrets isolation, and end‑to‑end encryption where it matters.

customization.title: Customization
customization.desc: Composable primitives and theming that match your brand—not the other way around.

control.title: Control
control.desc: Granular roles, environments, rate limits, and audit trails for confident governance.

ai.title: Built for AI
ai.desc: Token‑aware streaming, function calling, and vector‑native workflows baked in.

chat.startConversationDescription: Ask anything to get started. Your messages appear here.
chat.demoEndedDescription: You've reached the demo limit for this session.
